name: safequest
description: An AI-powered interactive storytelling platform designed to teach children important life values through engaging, personalized adventures with TTS narration and dynamic character interactions.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env || copy backend\.env.example backend\.env

author: SafeQuest Team
